main: ^Thank you so much! Now our planet will be warm again in no time!

s: ^I will go home to repair my own things.
^I will see if there are more people that need my help.

back: ^I am sure you can repair a lot of things in the future.
^Feel free to stay on our planet as long as you wish.
^If you wish to return home, you can jump into your spaceship at any time.
people: ^I am sure that a lot of people would be very happy if you help them to repair their broken objects.
^Feel free to stay on our planet as long as you wish.
^If you wish to continue your journey, you can jump into your spaceship at any time.
